analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The reverse order of the dependent origination, The Paṭṭhāna text with the Tikas
The Triad of the Wholesome, the Triad of the Subject🔽A wholesome, not subject to cankers, object condition for a neutral, subject to cankers, consciousness. …

original: Nakusalo naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo abyākatassa upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena🔽paccayo … cha pañhā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe cha, anantare samanantare upanissaye🔽cha, purejāte tīṇi, kamme pañca, āhāre tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nakusalaṁ naanupādinnupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo🔽uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na kusalaḥ na aupādinnupādāniyaḥ dhammaḥ abyākatassa upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena  paccayo cha pañhā saṅkhitta ārammaṇe cha anantare samanantare upanissaye  cha purejāte tīṇi kamme pañca āhāre tīṇi atthiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na kusalam na anupādinnupādāniyam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ anupādinnupādāniyaḥ dhammaḥ  uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca adhipatiyā pañca pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate pañca
